name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Bernadette KING, Appellant

ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of Sentence Affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 498
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Bernadette KING, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 19, 1982.
Decided May 25, 1982.
Salvatore J. Cucinotta, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., David Da Costa, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
